ygData.subject: Re: Stupid Question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s a nice additional effect of our song.  Normal ultravision does not allow you to see invis, however.  Concord is dual effect in nature, see invis +
ygData.messageBody:
> Nobody explicitly said this, but if I'm not mistaken, Ultravision
> also allows you to see through invisibility. I used to sing it to find
> out whether any of my favorite KSing Wizards were hiding in the rooms
> with us in High Keep. I am pretty certain that infravision does not see
> invisible, since I believe it is the same as my native Half-Elf
> infravision.

It's a nice additional effect of our song. Normal ultravision
does not allow you to see invis, however. Concord is dual
effect in nature, see invis + ultravision.

Harmonic 8)
